original_title: Wu Tang: Kung Fu Vampire / Hidden Darts
overview: Brothers battle a powerful vampire and a beautiful ghost in Kung Fu Vampire, and dynasty warriors employ secret techniques against the Manchus in Hidden Darts, two martial arts flicks from the Wu Tang: Soldiers of Darkness collection. Directed by Billy Chan and Leung Chung, the genre-bending Kung Fu Vampire follows a pair of feuding siblings whose rivalry goes comically awry when they resurrect two corpses.
title: Wu Tang: Kung Fu Vampire / Hidden Darts
